Original: This request is from a researcher
working for the Grand Court. Have you
ever been to the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:0]?
[Page]
It is a frigid place, covered in ice.
Some say within that ice is preserved
the corpse of an ancient creature.
[Page]
The researcher would like you to bring
its remains here to Tharsis.
[Page]
But the ice is very thick... it will
not be easy to remove. I suppose that
is why they called upon you.
[Page]
Take care, and I shall await your
swift return.
Translation: This request is from a researcher
working for the Grand Court. Have you
ever been to the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:0]?
[Page]
It is a frigid place, covered in ice.
Some say within that ice is preserved
the corpse of an ancient creature.
[Page]
The researcher would like you to bring
its remains here to Tharsis.
[Page]
But the ice is very thick... it will
not be easy to remove. I suppose that
is why they called upon you.
[Page]
Take care, and I shall await your
swift return.

Original: Welcome back. Did you manage to
excavate the ancient creature's
remains?
[Page]
Oh, is this it? Hmm... a fossil of an
ancient creature. It looks like it
might get up and walk away.
[Page]
But those wings have a sinister cast
to them... I wonder what kind of beast
it was when it was alive.
[Page]
Well, I shall see that the researcher
gets it. Here, as promised, is your
reward for the request.
Translation: Welcome back. Did you manage to
excavate the ancient creature's
remains?
[Page]
Oh, is this it? Hmm... a fossil of an
ancient creature. It looks like it
might get up and walk away.
[Page]
But those wings have a sinister cast
to them... I wonder what kind of beast
it was when it was alive.
[Page]
Well, I shall see that the researcher
gets it. Here, as promised, is your
reward for the request.

Original: You reach your destination in search
of the ancient creature's remains
and see something in an ice pillar.
[Page]
It is part of some creature's body...
But it is encased in thick ice and
cannot be reached.
[Page]
If you intend to complete the request,
you must first do something about
this ice pillar.
Translation: You reach your destination in search
of the ancient creature's remains
and see something in an ice pillar.
[Page]
It is part of some creature's body...
But it is encased in thick ice and
cannot be reached.
[Page]
If you intend to complete the request,
you must first do something about
this ice pillar.

Original: You can see the remains of some
creature trapped in the pillar of
ice before you...
[Page]
If you intend to complete the request,
you must first do something about
this ice pillar.
Translation: You can see the remains of some
creature trapped in the pillar of
ice before you...
[Page]
If you intend to complete the request,
you must first do something about
this ice pillar.

Original: As you travel in search of the ancient
creature's remains, you spot the body
of an unknown animal at your feet.
[Page]
Perhaps these frozen remains spilled
out after the ice melted...
[Page]
Perhaps the ice preserved it well, but
it is hard to believe these remains
are ancient, due to their condition.
[Page]
You need only take the remains back
with you to Tharsis in order to
complete the request.
Translation: As you travel in search of the ancient
creature's remains, you spot the body
of an unknown animal at your feet.
[Page]
Perhaps these frozen remains spilled
out after the ice melted...
[Page]
Perhaps the ice preserved it well, but
it is hard to believe these remains
are ancient, due to their condition.
[Page]
You need only take the remains back
with you to Tharsis in order to
complete the request.

Original: The remains of an unknown animal are
scattered at your feet...
[Page]
You need only take the remains back
with you to Tharsis in order to
complete the request.
Translation: The remains of an unknown animal are
scattered at your feet...
[Page]
You need only take the remains back
with you to Tharsis in order to
complete the request.

Original: [Color:5]Take the animal remains?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Take the animal remains?[Color:0]

Original: You wrap the remains in a cloth and
put them with your belongings.
Translation: You wrap the remains in a cloth and
put them with your belongings.

Original: The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.
Translation: The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.

Original: You prioritize exploration over the
completion of the request and leave
the remains where they lie.
Translation: You prioritize exploration over the
completion of the request and leave
the remains where they lie.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
